---

## Feature Summary
Brief, clear description of the requested feature.

---

## Problem Statement
What problem does this feature solve?
Who is affected, and why does it matter?

> Focus on the problem, not the solution.

---

## Desired Outcome
What does success look like if this feature is implemented?

---

## Target Users
Who benefits from this feature?
- [ ] Guests / Customers
- [ ] Hosts / Property Managers / Enterprise
- [ ] Admin / Internal users
- [ ] Developers
- [ ] Other: _______

---

## Business & User Impact
How valuable is this feature?

- **Impact level:**
  - [ ] Low (nice-to-have)
  - [ ] Medium (improves workflows)
  - [ ] High (unblocks key use cases)
  - [ ] Critical (strategic / revenue-impacting)

- **User reach:**
  - [ ] Few users
  - [ ] Many users
  - [ ] All users
  - [ ] Unknown

## Alternatives Considered
Have you considered other approaches or workarounds?

## Constraints & Considerations
- Performance
- Security
- Privacy
- Accessibility
- Backward compatibility
- External dependencies

---

## Acceptance Criteria (Optional but Encouraged)
How can we validate that this feature is complete?

- [ ] Given X, when Y, then Z

## Mockups / Diagrams (Optional)
Attach screenshots, sketches, or diagrams if available.

## Related Issues / PRs
Link any related discussions, issues, or pull requests.

## Requester Checklist
- [ ] I searched existing feature requests
- [ ] This is a problem, not just an idea
- [ ] I described expected outcomes clearly
